text: Nové Zámky (; ) is a town in the Nitra Region in southwestern Slovakia. About 40,000 people live there. The town is on the river Nitra. It is about 100 km east of Bratislava and is about 25 km north of the Hungarian border. Nové Zámky has a temperate continental climate. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Nitra Region
title: Nové Zámky
